dimensions:
Warp x Weft: 663 x 61 cm (21 ft. 9 in. x 24 in.)
Pattern repeat H x W: 25 x 19.5 cm (9 13/16 x 7 11/16 in.)
title: Fragment
medium: Technique: Jacquard woven. 4 & 1 satin damask. Weft float face interruption, 1. Warp float face interruption, 2.
description: Length of damask used to protect carpeting on stairs during summer. Pattern of offset leaves with berries framed by flowers forming a lattice. This pattern fills the 42.5 cm (16 3/4 in.) central section. Border on both sides, mirror images of each other, 7.5 cm (3 in.) wide with simple fret and dotted guards. Brown warp and ivory weft.
name: Fragment
